wikipedia_page.main: James Scott Cumberland Reid, Baron Reid,  (30 July 1890 – 29 March 1975) was a Scottish Unionist politician and judge.  His reputation is as one of the most outstanding judges of the 20th century.

response: * James Reid, Baron Reid (1890–1975), Scottish Unionist politician and judge
*James Reid, Baron Reid (1890–1975), Scottish lawyer, Conservative politician and judge
